rules_text:
When Pure-Power Scholar enters, create a Cell token. Then you gain 1 life for each artifact you control. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Conceptualize {2}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
